item.title: Voici la première station-service sans pompe à essence en France, et c’est une petite révolution
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>strong>En Bretagne, l'entreprise néerlandaise Fastned va inaugurer en 2026 une station-service d'un nouveau genre sans une goutte d'essence/strong> et uniquement réservée aux voitures électriques avec la présence de bornes de recharge./div> /div>]]> ]]>

item.title: « Il s’agit probablement du Sarmat », ce tir de missile balistique russe complètement manqué interroge les experts
Les voitures électriques de Huawei sont prêtes pour arriver en Europe la preuve avec cette photo volée
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>Des images espion récemment apparues sur la toile lèvent le voile sur la version internationale du système d'infodivertissement du nouvel Aito M9. Au-delà d’un simple changement de langue, Huawei semble avoir profondément repensé son écosystème numérique pour répondre aux normes, aux habitudes et aux services attendus hors de Chine./div> /div>]]> ]]>

item.title: Android sur SteamOS et Linux Valve sort l’artillerie lourde avec le projet Lepton
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>Vous connaissez Proton, l'outil magique qui fait tourner Cyberpunk 2077 sur votre Steam Deck ? Préparez-vous à accueillir strong>Lepton/strong>. Valve adapte la technologie strong>Waydroid/strong> pour intégrer l'écosystème Android directement dans Steam. Une grenouille en logo, des fichiers de configuration repérés le plan de Valve se dessine./div> /div>]]> ]]>
item.category: Casques et lunettes de réalité virtuelle, augmentée et mixte

item.title: Ugreen Nexode 130 W cette petite batterie à -38 %, parfaite pour les baroudeurs, vous suivra partout avec ses 20 000 mAh
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>La Ugreen Nexode c'est le genre de batterie externe qui fait office d'investissement, elle est pratique, mobile et permet de recharger avec une charge rapide plusieurs appareils. Sur Amazon, elle s'affiche à 49,99 euros au lieu de 79,99 euros./div> /div>]]> ]]>

item.title: YouTube s’inspire enfin de la meilleure idée de Spotify avec YouTube Recap comment y accéder
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>YouTube propose enfin un résumé de son année sur la plateforme. Un récap demandé depuis longtemps par les fans. /div> /div>]]> ]]>]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-12630 The Upload.am WordPress plugin before 1.0.1 is vulnerable to arbitrary option disclosure due to a m...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[The Upload.am WordPress plugin before 1.0.1 is vulnerable to arbitrary option disclosure due to a missing capability check on its AJAX request handler, allowing users such as contributor to view site options. | CVSS Score 4.9 (MEDIUM) ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-13372 An issue was discovered in 5.2 before 5.2.9, 5.1 before 5.1.15, and 4.2 before 4.2.27. `FilteredRela...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[An issue was discovered in 5.2 before 5.2.9, 5.1 before 5.1.15, and 4.2 before 4.2.27. `FilteredRelation` is subject to SQL injection in column aliases, using a suitably crafted dictionary, with dictionary expansion, as the `**kwargs` passed to `QuerySet.annotate()` or `QuerySet.alias()` on PostgreSQL. Earlier, unsupported Django series (such as 5.0.x, 4.1.x, and 3.2.x) were not evaluated and may also be affected. Django would like to thank Stackered for reporting this issue. | CVSS Score 4.3 (MEDIUM) ]]>]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-13877 A vulnerability was detected in nocobase up to 1.9.4/2.0.0-alpha.37. The affected element is an unkn...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[A vulnerability was detected in nocobase up to 1.9.4/2.0.0-alpha.37. The affected element is an unknown function of the file nocobase\packages\core\auth\src\base\jwt-service.ts of the component JWT Service. The manipulation of the argument API_KEY results in use of hard-coded cryptographic key . The attack can be launched remotely. A high complexity level is associated with this attack. The exploitability is described as difficult. The exploit is now public and may be used. The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way. | CVSS Score 5.6 (MEDIUM) ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-58113 An out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in the EMF functionality of PDF-XChange Co. Ltd PDF-XChan...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[An out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in the EMF functionality of PDF-XChange Co. Ltd PDF-XChange Editor 10.7.3.401. By using a specially crafted EMF file, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform an out-of-bounds read, potentially leading to the disclosure of sensitive information. | CVSS Score 6.5 (MEDIUM) ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-59703 Entrust nShield Connect XC, nShield 5c, and nShield HSMi through 13.6.11, or 13.7, allow a Physicall...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[Entrust nShield Connect XC, nShield 5c, and nShield HSMi through 13.6.11, or 13.7, allow a Physically Proximate Attacker to access the internal components of the appliance, without leaving tamper evidence. To exploit this, the attacker needs to remove the tamper label and all fixing screws from the device without damaging it. This is called an F14 attack. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-59704 Entrust nShield Connect XC, nShield 5c, and nShield HSMi through 13.6.11, or 13.7, allow an attacker...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[Entrust nShield Connect XC, nShield 5c, and nShield HSMi through 13.6.11, or 13.7, allow an attacker to gain access the the BIOS menu because is has no password. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-63872 DeepSeek V3.2 has a Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability, which allows JavaScript execution thro...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[DeepSeek V3.2 has a Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability, which allows JavaScript execution through model-generated SVG content. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-64460 An issue was discovered in 5.2 before 5.2.9, 5.1 before 5.1.15, and 4.2 before 4.2.27. Algorithmic c...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[An issue was discovered in 5.2 before 5.2.9, 5.1 before 5.1.15, and 4.2 before 4.2.27. Algorithmic complexity in `django.core.serializers.xml_serializer.getInnerText()` allows a remote attacker to cause a potential denial-of-service attack triggering CPU and memory exhaustion via specially crafted XML input processed by the XML `Deserializer`. Earlier, unsupported Django series (such as 5.0.x, 4.1.x, and 3.2.x) were not evaluated and may also be affected. Django would like to thank Seokchan Yoon for reporting this issue. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]>]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-65187 A Stored Cross Site Scripting vulnerability exists in CiviCRM before v6.7 in the Accounting Batches ...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[A Stored Cross Site Scripting vulnerability exists in CiviCRM before v6.7 in the Accounting Batches field. An authenticated user can inject malicious JavaScript into this field and it executes whenever the page is viewed. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]>

item.title: Personne n’a réussi à copier WeChat hors de Chine pourquoi Elon Musk pense y arriver avec X
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>Dans une interview récente, Elon Musk a réaffirmé son objectif final transformer a href="https//www.frandroid.com/telecharger/apps/twitter">X/a> en une copie améliorée de strong>WeChat/strong>. Il veut recréer le succès phénoménal de l'application chinoise à l'échelle mondiale. Sauf que copier une anomalie culturelle chinoise pour l'imposer à l'Occident, c'est un défi que personne n'a relevé./div> /div>]]> ]]>]]>

item.title: Trois nouveaux jeux The Witcher en six ans, est-ce bien raisonnable ?
#FrandroidOffreMoi un super trio Xbox (casque, manette et 3 mois Game Pass Ultimate)
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>On est au deuxième jour du calendrier de l'Avent 2025 de Frandroid. Dans le cadre du concours, vous pouvez remporter un joli lot Xbox avec une manette en édition spéciale, un casque sans fil et 3 mois au Game Pass Ultimate./div> /div>]]> ]]>]]>

item.title: La Google Pixel Watch 4 profite de la fin du Black Friday pour baisser de prix
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>Dévoilée cet été, la Google Pixel Watch 4 est une montre connectée premium précise, complète et qui a même bénéficié de quelques améliorations. Et elle affiche enfin un prix réduit Amazon et Darty la proposent à 329 euros au lieu de 399 euros./div> /div>]]> ]]>]]>

item.title: OpenAI déclare l’alerte rouge ChatGPT menacé par la montée en puissance de Google Gemini
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>L'histoire a le sens de l'ironie. Il y a trois ans, Google déclenchait une alerte générale à la sortie de ChatGPT. Aujourd'hui ? C'est l'inverse. strong>Sam Altman/strong> vient de déclarer un "Code Rouge" chez OpenAI. La cause est simple strong>Gemini 3 Pro/strong> est devenu trop dangereux./div> /div>]]> ]]>]]>

item.title: Windows 11 la mise à jour qui améliore le mode sombre fait finalement buguer le mode sombre
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>La dernière mise à jour de Windows 11 est censée améliorer significativement le mode sombre dans l'Explorateur de fichiers. Problème elle provoque un bug d'affichage du mode sombre dans ce même Explorateur./div> /div>]]> ]]>]]>

item.title: Google voudrait afficher le numéro IMEI de votre smartphone sur l’écran de verrouillage, mais pourquoi ?
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>Les smartphones Android pourraient bientôt afficher leur numéro IMEI directement sur l'écran de verrouillage. Il y a une logique derrière ce choix étonnant./div> /div>]]> ]]>]]>

item.title: « La construction a commencé » SpaceX se déploie massivement en Floride, Starship aura bientôt trois pas de tir
C’est l’heure du Récap’ 2025 sur YouTube l’équivalent du Spotify Wrapped en vidéo arrive
Realme Buds Clip des écouteurs à clip ouverts pour allier musique et conscience de l’environnement
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>La marque realme enrichit son catalogue audio avec les Buds Clip, ses premiers écouteurs à conception ouverte adoptant un design à clip inédit pour le fabricant mais déjà vu chez d’autres. En voici tous les détails./div> /div>]]> ]]>]]>]]>

item.title: Mistral AI dévoile Mistral 3 et Ministral des modèles qui replacent la France sur la scène open source
« Google Antigravity a supprimé mon disque dur », la session de vibe coding d’un photographe vire au cauchemar
Galaxy Tab A11 déjà à petit prix, cette nouvelle tablette Samsung avec écran 90 Hz tombe à seulement 119 €
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>La Samsung Galaxy Tab A11 vient de sortir, mais cette tablette au design épuré et à l'écran bien fluide a déjà bénéficié de plusieurs promotions depuis. C'est d'ailleurs en ce moment que son prix est vraiment intéressant sur Amazon, la version 64 Go peut vous revenir à 119,90 euros au lieu de 179,90 euros./div> /div>]]> ]]>]]>]]>

item.title: Apple AirTag, Galaxy SmartTag, Tile… quel porte-clé connecté choisir en 2025 ?
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>Les porte-clés connectés sont arrivés via Apple et Samsung. d'autres marques s'y sont ensuite mises. Découvrez les meilleurs trackers connectés pour ne plus rien perdre./div> /div>]]> ]]>]]>]]>]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-13505 Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting'), Imprope...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting'), Improper Neutralization of Script-Related HTML Tags in a Web Page (Basic XSS) vulnerability in Datateam Information Technologies Inc. Datactive allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Datactive from 2.13.34 before 2.14.0.6. | CVSS Score 4.8 (MEDIUM) ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-13875 A weakness has been identified in Yohann0617 oci-helper up to 3.2.4. This issue affects the function...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[A weakness has been identified in Yohann0617 oci-helper up to 3.2.4. This issue affects the function addCfg of the file src/main/java/com/yohann/ocihelper/service/impl/OciServiceImpl.java of the component OCI Configuration Upload. Executing manipulation of the argument File can lead to path traversal. It is possible to launch the attack remotely. The exploit has been made available to the public and could be exploited. The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way. | CVSS Score 6.3 (MEDIUM) ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-13876 A security vulnerability has been detected in Rareprob HD Video Player All Formats App 12.1.372 on A...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[A security vulnerability has been detected in Rareprob HD Video Player All Formats App 12.1.372 on Android. Impacted is an unknown function of the component com.rocks.music.videoplayer. The manipulation leads to path traversal. The attack needs to be performed locally. The exploit has been disclosed publicly and may be used. The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way. | CVSS Score 5.3 (MEDIUM) ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-59693 The Chassis Management Board in Entrust nShield Connect XC, nShield 5c, and nShield HSMi through 13....
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[The Chassis Management Board in Entrust nShield Connect XC, nShield 5c, and nShield HSMi through 13.6.11, or 13.7, allows a physically proximate attacker to obtain debug access and escalate privileges by bypassing the tamper label and opening the chassis without leaving evidence, and accessing the JTAG connector. This is called F02. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-59694 The Chassis Management Board in Entrust nShield Connect XC, nShield 5c, and nShield HSMi through 13....
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[The Chassis Management Board in Entrust nShield Connect XC, nShield 5c, and nShield HSMi through 13.6.11, or 13.7, allows a physically proximate attacker to persistently modify firmware and influence the (insecurely configured) appliance boot process. To exploit this, the attacker must modify the firmware via JTAG or perform an upgrade to the chassis management board firmware. This is called F03. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-59695 Entrust nShield Connect XC, nShield 5c, and nShield HSMi through 13.6.11, or 13.7, allow a user with...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Entrust nShield Connect XC, nShield 5c, and nShield HSMi through 13.6.11, or 13.7, allow a user with OS root access to alter firmware on the Chassis Management Board (without Authentication). This is called F04. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-59696 Entrust nShield Connect XC, nShield 5c, and nShield HSMi through 13.6.11, or 13.7, allow a physicall...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Entrust nShield Connect XC, nShield 5c, and nShield HSMi through 13.6.11, or 13.7, allow a physically proximate attacker to modify or erase tamper events via the Chassis management board. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-59697 Entrust nShield Connect XC, nShield 5c, and nShield HSMi through 13.6.11, or 13.7, allow a physicall...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Entrust nShield Connect XC, nShield 5c, and nShield HSMi through 13.6.11, or 13.7, allow a physically proximate attacker to escalate privileges by editing the Legacy GRUB bootloader configuration to start a root shell upon boot of the host OS. This is called F06. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-59698 Entrust nShield Connect XC, nShield 5c, and nShield HSMi through 13.6.11, or 13.7, might allow a phy...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Entrust nShield Connect XC, nShield 5c, and nShield HSMi through 13.6.11, or 13.7, might allow a physically proximate attacker to gain access to the EOL legacy bootloader. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-59699 Entrust nShield Connect XC, nShield 5c, and nShield HSMi through 13.6.11, or 13.7, allow a physicall...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Entrust nShield Connect XC, nShield 5c, and nShield HSMi through 13.6.11, or 13.7, allow a physically proximate attacker to escalate privileges by booting from a USB device with a valid root filesystem. This occurs because of insecure default settings in the Legacy GRUB Bootloader. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-59700 Entrust nShield Connect XC, nShield 5c, and nShield HSMi through 13.6.11, or 13.7, allow a physicall...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Entrust nShield Connect XC, nShield 5c, and nShield HSMi through 13.6.11, or 13.7, allow a physically proximate attacker with root access to modify the Recovery Partition (because of a lack of integrity protection). | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-59701 Entrust nShield Connect XC, nShield 5c, and nShield HSMi through 13.6.11, or 13.7, allow a physicall...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Entrust nShield Connect XC, nShield 5c, and nShield HSMi through 13.6.11, or 13.7, allow a physically proximate attacker (with elevated privileges) to read and modify the Appliance SSD contents (because they are unencrypted). | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Entrust nShield Connect XC, nShield 5c, and nShield HSMi through 13.6.11, or 13.7, allow a Physically Proximate Attacker to Escalate Privileges by enabling the USB interface through chassis probe insertion during system boot, aka "Unauthorized Reactivation of the USB interface" or F01. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: Apple Music Replay 2025 est disponible comment accéder à sa rétrospective de l’année ?
MVNO opérateurs, débits, avantages, prix… Tout savoir sur les opérateurs mobiles virtuels en 2025
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>Dans la guerre des prix des forfaits mobiles, le terme de MVNO ressort de temps en temps pour définir une certaine catégorie d'opérateur. Il se peut même que vous soyez abonné à un MVNO sans le savoir. De quoi s'agit-il ? Comment ça marche ? Combien ça coûte ? Toutes les réponses sont ici./div> /div>]]> ]]>]]>]]>

Nous avons sélectionné et rassemblé ici les meilleurs TV Oled que nous avons testés./div> /div>]]> ]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>

CVE-2025-13295 Insertion of Sensitive Information Into Sent Data vulnerability in Argus Technology Inc. BILGER allo...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Insertion of Sensitive Information Into Sent Data vulnerability in Argus Technology Inc. BILGER allows Choosing Message Identifier.This issue affects BILGER before 2.4.9. | CVSS Score 7.5 (HIGH) ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-13731 The Nexter Extension – Site Enhancements Toolkit plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[The Nexter Extension – Site Enhancements Toolkit plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's 'nxt-year' shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 4.4.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page. | CVSS Score 6.4 (MEDIUM) ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-41013 SQL injection vulnerability in TCMAN GIM v11 in version 20250304. This vulnerability allows an attac...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[SQL injection vulnerability in TCMAN GIM v11 in version 20250304. This vulnerability allows an attacker to retrieve, create, update, and delete databases by sending a GET request using the 'idmant' parameter in '/PC/frmEPIS.aspx'. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-41014 User Enumeration Vulnerability in TCMAN GIM v11 version 20250304. This vulnerability allows an unaut...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[User Enumeration Vulnerability in TCMAN GIM v11 version 20250304. This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated attacker to determine whether a user exists on the system. The vulnerability is exploitable through the 'pdausername' parameter with 'soapaction GetLastDatePasswordChange' in '/WS/PDAWebService.asmx'. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-41015 User Enumeration Vulnerability in TCMAN GIM v11 version 20250304. This vulnerability allows an unaut...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[User Enumeration Vulnerability in TCMAN GIM v11 version 20250304. This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated attacker to determine whether a user exists on the system. The vulnerability is exploitable through the 'pdausername' parameter with 'soapaction GetUserQuestionAndAnswer' in '/WS/PDAWebService.asmx'. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-41066 Horde Groupware v5.2.22 has a user enumeration vulnerability that allows an unauthenticated attacker...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Horde Groupware v5.2.22 has a user enumeration vulnerability that allows an unauthenticated attacker to determine the existence of valid accounts on the system. To exploit the vulnerability, an HTTP request must be sent to ‘/imp/attachment.php’ including the parameters ‘id’ and ‘u’. If the specified user exists, the server will return the download of an empty file if it does not exist, no download will be initiated, which unequivocally reveals the validity of the user. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-41086 Vulnerability in the access control system of the GAMS licensing system that allows unlimited valid ...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Vulnerability in the access control system of the GAMS licensing system that allows unlimited valid licenses to be generated, bypassing any usage restrictions. The validator uses an insecure checksum algorithm knowing this algorithm and the format of the license lines, an attacker can recalculate the checksum and generate a valid license to grant themselves full privileges without credentials or access to the source code, allowing them unrestricted access to GAMS's mathematical models and commercial solvers. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-65858 A Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Calibre-Web v0.6.25 allows attackers to inject ...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[A Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Calibre-Web v0.6.25 allows attackers to inject malicious JavaScript into the 'username' field during user creation. The payload is stored unsanitized and later executed when the /ajax/listusers endpoint is accessed. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: Voici comment One UI 8.5 veut en finir avec les applications pleines de pubs
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>La prochaine mise à jour de One UI s'attaque aux applis un peu trop chargées en publicités avec une option cachée, mais bien pratique./div> /div>]]> ]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>

item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>Après le Black Friday, on trouve encore de belles offres comme cette promotion sur le récent Bose QuietComfort Ultra II qui passe de 449 euros à 399 euros chez plusieurs e-commerçants. /div> /div>]]> ]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>

S'il conserve la définition de son prédécesseur, il se veut plus rapide aussi bien en photo qu'en vidéo. /div> /div>]]> ]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>

item.title: PS5 sans le dire à personne, Sony a modifié un détail pourtant crucial de ses consoles
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>Les PlayStation 5 les plus récemment sorties d'usine profitent d'un changement très utile mais bien caché dans leurs entrailles le passage à une nouvelle technique d'application de leur métal liquide. On vous explique en quoi c'est une très bonne nouvelle./div> /div>]]> ]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>

item.title: La R5 électrique franchit un cap symbolique et s’offre une fonction attendue de longue date
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>Ça y est, la Renault 5 E-Tech a franchi le cap du 100 000ᵉ exemplaire produit. À l'occasion de cette célébration, la marque annonce enfin l'arrivée du "one-pedal" sur sa petite voiture électrique en janvier 2026./div> /div>]]> ]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>

Et les chiffres sont très encourageants./div> /div>]]> ]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>

item.title: 100 000 R5 produites Renault fête ce cap en annonçant une fonction très attendue
À vous les couleurs éclatantes dans vos jeux avec cet écran LG OLED de 32″ à 165 Hz qui dilue son prix de 30 %
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>Vous avez envie de bousculer votre manière de voir vos jeux ? Et si une dalle OLED signée par l’un des maîtres du genre devenait votre passeport pour le pays des merveilles ? C’est exactement ce que promet le LG UltraGear 32GX850A une dalle OLED fluide, compatible 4K et HDR et 165 Hz qui passe à 704 euros au lieu de 999 euros./div> /div>]]> ]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>

item.title: « Ce partenariat n’est pas seulement nécessaire, il est transformateur » pourquoi Realme s’est associé à un géant de la photo pour ses prochains smartphones
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>À l'occasion du lancement du Realme GT 8 Pro, conçu en partenariat avec Ricoh, nous avons eu l'occasion de nous entretenir avec des responsables de deux marques pour mieux comprendre les coulisses de ce partenariat. /div> /div>]]> ]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>

Très compacts une fois refermés, ils déploient de grands écrans pour une expérience visuelle plus agréable. Découvrez ici notre sélection des meilleurs modèles pliables, testés et approuvés par nos soins./div> /div>]]> ]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>

Le marché de la mémoire vive connaît une crise qui ne semble pas près de s'arrêter. /div> /div>]]> ]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>

item.title: Windows 11 le créateur du Gestionnaire des tâches ne veut « plus d’IA, seulement des correctifs » dans Windows
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>Selon Dave Plummer, ancien développeur de Microsoft et créateur du Gestionnaire de tâches, Windows 11 doit revenir à l'essentiel et corriger ses défauts avant de proposer de nouvelles fonctionnalités. /div> /div> ]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-11778 Stack-based buffer overflow in Circutor SGE-PLC1000/SGE-PLC50 v0.9.2. This vulnerability allows an a...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Stack-based buffer overflow in Circutor SGE-PLC1000/SGE-PLC50 v0.9.2. This vulnerability allows an attacker to remotely exploit memory corruption through the 'read_packet()' function of the TACACSPLUS implementation. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-11779 Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in CircutorSGE-PLC1000/SGE-PLC50 v9.0.2. The 'SetLan' func...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in CircutorSGE-PLC1000/SGE-PLC50 v9.0.2. The 'SetLan' function is invoked when a new configuration is applied. This new configuration function is activated by a management web request, which can be invoked by a user when making changes to the 'index.cgi' web application. The parameters are not being sanitised, which could lead to command injection. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-11780 Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in Circutor SGE-PLC1000/SGE-PLC50 v9.0.2. In the 'showMete...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in Circutor SGE-PLC1000/SGE-PLC50 v9.0.2. In the 'showMeterReport()' function, there is an unlimited user input that is copied to a fixed-size buffer via 'sprintf()'. The 'GetParameter(meter)' function retrieves the user input, which is directly incorporated into a buffer without size validation. An attacker can provide an excessively large input for the “meter” parameter. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-11781 Use of hardcoded cryptographic keys in Circutor SGE-PLC1000/SGE-PLC50 v9.0.2. The affected firmware ...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Use of hardcoded cryptographic keys in Circutor SGE-PLC1000/SGE-PLC50 v9.0.2. The affected firmware contains a hardcoded static authentication key. An attacker with local access to the device can extract this key (e.g., by analysing the firmware image or memory dump) and create valid firmware update packages. This bypasses all intended access controls and grants full administrative privileges. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-11782 Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in Circutor SGE-PLC1000/SGE-PLC50 v9.0.2. The 'ShowDownloa...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in Circutor SGE-PLC1000/SGE-PLC50 v9.0.2. The 'ShowDownload()' function uses “sprintf()” to format a string that includes the user-controlled input of 'GetParameter(meter)' in the fixed-size buffer 'acStack_4c' (64 bytes) without checking the length. An attacker can provide an excessively long value for the 'meter' parameter that exceeds the 64-byte buffer size. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-11783 Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in Circutor SGE-PLC1000/SGE-PLC50 v9.0.2. The vulnerabilit...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in Circutor SGE-PLC1000/SGE-PLC50 v9.0.2. The vulnerability is found in the 'AddEvent()' function when copying the user-controlled username input to a fixed-size buffer (48 bytes) without boundary checking. This can lead to memory corruption, resulting in possible remote code execution. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-11784 Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in Circutor SGE-PLC1000/SGE-PLC50 v9.0.2. In the 'ShowMete...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in Circutor SGE-PLC1000/SGE-PLC50 v9.0.2. In the 'ShowMeterDatabase()' function, there is an unlimited user input that is copied to a fixed-size buffer via 'sprintf()'. The 'GetParameter(meter)' function retrieves the user input, which is directly incorporated into a buffer without size validation. An attacker can provide an excessively large input for the 'meter' parameter. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-11785 Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in Circutor SGE-PLC1000/SGE-PLC50 v9.0.2. In the 'ShowMete...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in Circutor SGE-PLC1000/SGE-PLC50 v9.0.2. In the 'ShowMeterPasswords()' function, there is an unlimited user input that is copied to a fixed-size buffer via 'sprintf()'. The 'GetParameter(meter)' function retrieves the user input, which is directly incorporated into a buffer without size validation. An attacker can provide an excessively large input for the 'meter' parameter. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-11786 Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in Circutor SGE-PLC1000/SGE-PLC50 v9.0.2. In the 'SetUserP...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in Circutor SGE-PLC1000/SGE-PLC50 v9.0.2. In the 'SetUserPassword()' function, the 'newPassword' parameter is directly embedded in a shell command string using 'sprintf()' without any sanitisation or validation, and then executed using 'system()'. This allows an attacker to inject arbitrary shell commands that will be executed with the same privileges as the application. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-11787 Command injection vulnerability in the operating system in Circutor SGE-PLC1000/SGE-PLC50 v9.0.2 thr...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Command injection vulnerability in the operating system in Circutor SGE-PLC1000/SGE-PLC50 v9.0.2 through the 'GetDNS()', 'CheckPing()' and 'TraceRoute()' functions. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-11788 Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in Circutor SGE-PLC1000/SGE-PLC50 v9.0.2. In the 'ShowSuper...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in Circutor SGE-PLC1000/SGE-PLC50 v9.0.2. In the 'ShowSupervisorParameters()' function, there is an unlimited user input that is copied to a fixed-size buffer via 'sprintf()'. The 'GetParameter(meter)' function retrieves the user input, which is directly incorporated into a buffer without size validation. An attacker can provide an excessively large input for the 'meter' parameter. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-11789 Out-of-bounds read vulnerability in Circutor SGE-PLC1000/SGE-PLC50 v9.0.2. The 'DownloadFile' functi...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Out-of-bounds read vulnerability in Circutor SGE-PLC1000/SGE-PLC50 v9.0.2. The 'DownloadFile' function converts a parameter to an integer using 'atoi()' and then uses it as an index in the 'FilesDownload' array with '(FilesDownload)[iVar2]'. If the parameter is too large, it will access memory beyond the limits. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-12465 A Blind SQL injection vulnerability has been identified in QuickCMS. Improper neutralization of inpu...
item.description:
![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[A Blind SQL injection vulnerability has been identified in QuickCMS. Improper neutralization of input provided by a high-privileged user into aFilesDelete allows for Blind SQL Injection attacks.
The vendor was notified early about this vulnerability, but didn't respond with the details of vulnerability or vulnerable version range. Only version 6.8 was tested and confirmed as vulnerable, other versions were not tested and might also be vulnerable. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-13879 Directory traversal vulnerability in SOLIDserver IPAM v8.2.3. This vulnerability allows an authentic...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Directory traversal vulnerability in SOLIDserver IPAM v8.2.3. This vulnerability allows an authenticated user with administrator privileges to list directories other than those to which the have authorized access using the 'directory' parameter in '/mod/ajax.php?action=sections/list/list'.For examplem setting the 'directory' parameter to '/' displays files outside the 'LOCAL///' folder. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-40700 Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in IDI Eikon's Governalia. The vulnerability allows an attacker...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in IDI Eikon's Governalia. The vulnerability allows an attacker to execute JavaScript code in the victim's browser when a malicious URL with the 'q' parameter in '/search' is sent to them. This vulnerability can be exploited to steal sensitive information such as session cookies or to perform actions on behalf of the victim. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-41012 Unauthorized access vulnerability in TCMAN GIM v11 version 20250304. This vulnerability allows an un...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Unauthorized access vulnerability in TCMAN GIM v11 version 20250304. This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated attacker to determine whether a user exists on the system by using the 'pdauserId' and 'pdanewPassword' parameters with 'soapaction UnlockUser’ in '/WS/PDAWebService.asmx'. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: Bye-bye Apple pourquoi Nvidia sera le seul à profiter de cette innovation majeure en 2028
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>Nvidia semble avoir réussi à signer un accord avec TSMC lui permettant de profiter en premier, et potentiellement aussi en exclusivité, du futur procédé A16 que le fondeur taïwanais proposera d'ici à 2028./div> /div> ]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>
